tier_1_critical.name: Critical Backup – Apartment Essentials
tier_1_critical.recommended_usage: Fridge, lights, modem, phone/laptop charging during outages.
tier_1_critical.notes: Entry-level resilience for small flats and renters; pairs well with 1–2 portable solar panels.

tier_2_comfort.name: Comfort Backup – Balcony + Storage
tier_2_comfort.recommended_usage: Essential loads plus TV and some AC or fan time.
tier_2_comfort.notes: Good fit for 1+1 and 2+1 households targeting partial bill reduction and outage comfort.

tier_3_full_backup.name: Full-Home Backup – Single-Phase Hybrid
tier_3_full_backup.recommended_usage: Most household loads except large electric heating; day–night autonomy with solar.
tier_3_full_backup.notes: For detached houses / 3+1–4+1 flats aiming for serious self-consumption and blackout protection.

bundle_balcony_solar_starter.name: Balcony Solar Starter
bundle_balcony_solar_starter.recommended_usage: Renters and small flats with limited roof access, targeting bill reduction.
bundle_balcony_solar_starter.notes: Optimised for 1–2 kWh/day coverage in big cities like Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir.

bundle_home_office_resilience.name: Home Office Resilience Pack
bundle_home_office_resilience.recommended_usage: Remote workers needing guaranteed uptime for PC, monitors, modem and lighting.
bundle_home_office_resilience.notes: Covers 6–10 hours of full WFH load plus critical household appliances.

bundle_tiny_house_offgrid.name: Tiny House Off-Grid Kit
bundle_tiny_house_offgrid.recommended_usage: Tiny houses / bungalows with DC + AC mixed loads and moderate comfort.
bundle_tiny_house_offgrid.notes: Designed around 3–6 kWh/day usage patterns and 2–3 kW peak loads.

bundle_rv_marine_nomad.name: RV / Marine Nomad Pack
bundle_rv_marine_nomad.recommended_usage: Motorhomes, caravans and boats with 12 V and 230 V mixed systems.
bundle_rv_marine_nomad.notes: Covers fridge, navigation, electronics and climate-control support for mobile users.

bundle_villa_solar_plus.name: Villa Solar Plus
bundle_villa_solar_plus.recommended_usage: High-consumption villas with pool pumps, multiple AC units and large white-goods sets.
bundle_villa_solar_plus.notes: Targets 50–80% annual self-consumption coverage in high-sun regions.
